title: President Donald J. Trump Signs H.R. 582 into Law – The White House
content:
Statements & Releases			
Issued on:
February 16, 2018
On Friday, February 16, 2018, the President signed into law:H.R. 582, the “Kari’s Law Act of 2017,” which requires multi-line telephone systems to have a configuration that permits users to directly initiate a call to 9-1-1 without dialing any additional digit, code, prefix, or post-fix.
